job_tasks.phrase: Integrate ML models into deployable Python applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of building and deploying software that incorporates ML models, fitting the definition of integrating AI/ML features into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: Design reviews are a crucial part of the software development lifecycle, ensuring architectural soundness and adherence to best practices. Leading them also implies technical leadership, which is covered under this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices.
job_tasks.justification: Code review and ensuring adherence to team best practices are fundamental software engineering activities for quality assurance and team alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to sharing information and collaborating with the team through documentation and knowledge transfer, fitting the definition of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
soft_skills.justification: The involvement of 'peers and stakeholders' highlights the collaborative nature of design reviews and the need for effective communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices.
soft_skills.justification: Providing feedback on code and ensuring team best practices are implemented requires strong communication and collaborative effort.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
soft_skills.justification: This directly describes activities that foster team collaboration and knowledge dissemination.

profile.rationale: The job description's responsibilities are exclusively within Macro-Category A: Core Software Engineering, specifically 1.A.1. Software Development & Integration. There are no tasks related to Macro-Category B: GenAI Specialization. The role involves integrating ML models into applications, which aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities that fall solely under software development and integration, with no mention of specialized AI/ML model development or GenAI tasks. This makes the profile assignment straightforward and highly confident.
